title: SwiftSport: contact details refresh, chatbot lead capture UI, stronger copy, and new marketing images

requirements.summary: Replace all site contact details (display, mailto/tel links, copy-to-clipboard, and prefilled email actions) with swiftsports1512@gmail.com and 8431680623.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section email card shows swiftsports1512@gmail.com and its copy button copies swiftsports1512@gmail.com.
The Contact section phone card shows 8431680623 (in a readable formatted display is OK) and its copy button copies 8431680623.
Any tel: link uses the correct number (e.g., tel:8431680623 or tel:+918431680623), and any mailto: link uses swiftsports1512@gmail.com.
The footer contact email/phone display and links are updated to the same values.
The “Send via Email” action in the contact section sends to swiftsports1512@gmail.com.

file_operations.description: Update displayed email/phone, mailto: and tel: links, and copy-to-clipboard values to swiftsports1512@gmail.com and 8431680623; update the “Send via Email” mailto target and keep prefilled subject/body intact.
Update footer Contact email/phone display text and mailto:/tel: links to swiftsports1512@gmail.com and 8431680623.

requirements.summary: Add a floating chatbot-style lead-capture widget on the landing page to collect referee requirements and submit them with a success confirmation and reference identifier.
acceptanceCriteria: A chat widget is available on the landing page (e.g., floating button) and can be opened/closed without navigating away.
The chatbot flow collects at minimum: sport, number of officials required, date (or date/time), location, competition level, and the requester’s name + phone or email.
The user can review and submit the captured information at the end of the chat flow.
After submission, the UI shows a clear success confirmation and a reference identifier (or timestamp) for the request.
User-facing text in the chatbot is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a self-contained floating chatbot widget UI (open/close, message-style steps) that collects: sport, number of officials, date/time, location, competition level, and requester name + phone/email; include a review step and submit action; on success show confirmation plus a generated reference identifier/timestamp; on failure show an error state; display the chatbot avatar from frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-chatbot-avatar.dim_256x256.png with English alt text. Use core-infrastructure’s backend connection via the existing useActor hook to call the backend submission capability (when available) without introducing third-party services. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the ChatbotLeadWidget into the landing page so it is available without navigation (floating overlay present across the page content). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add any minimal global styles needed for the chatbot overlay behavior (e.g., safe stacking/z-index and motion preferences) while preserving existing theme variables; keep user-facing text in English.

requirements.summary: Refresh marketing copy across hero/services/process/contact to be more conversion-focused while staying accurate for a sports officials provider.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section headline/subheadline and CTA labels are updated with stronger marketing language (English).
Services and/or process section copy is refreshed with clearer benefits and outcomes (e.g., reliability, certified officials, fast replacements).
Contact section copy encourages action and aligns with the updated contact details.
All updated copy remains consistent in tone and does not introduce new product offerings not present on the site.

file_operations.description: Strengthen hero headline, subheadline, and CTA labels with more conversion-focused English copy while staying accurate to officiating services; keep existing scroll actions intact.
Refresh services section headings/descriptions in English to emphasize outcomes (reliability, certified officials, fast replacements) without adding new offerings.
Update process step titles/descriptions and CTA copy to be clearer and more benefit-driven in English while remaining accurate.
Update contact section headline/supporting copy and helper text in English to encourage action and align with the updated email/phone details.

requirements.summary: Add and integrate new static marketing images (hero, supporting section, chatbot avatar) as responsive frontend assets with English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: New images are added under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
At least one prominent image is displayed in/near the hero section, and at least one supporting image is displayed in another section (e.g., services/process/contact).
Images are responsive (look good on mobile and desktop) and do not cause layout shift issues.
All images have appropriate alt text in English.

file_operations.description: Add generated hero marketing image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-hero.dim_1600x900.png (static asset; not served from backend).
Add generated supporting section image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-support-1.dim_1200x800.png (static asset; not served from backend).

Add generated chatbot avatar/mascot icon asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-chatbot-avatar.dim_256x256.png (static asset; not served from backend; should support transparent background).

Integrate the hero image frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-hero.dim_1600x900.png into the hero section with responsive sizing and reserved space to avoid layout shift; include English alt text.

Add the supporting image frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-support-1.dim_1200x800.png to a supporting area of the services section (or its existing gradient callout) with responsive layout and English alt text; ensure it doesn’t cause layout shift issues.

Use the chatbot avatar image frontend/public/assets/generated/swiftsport-chatbot-avatar.dim_256x256.png in the widget UI (e.g., header/bot messages) with English alt text and responsive sizing. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
